name: Hello Mike
description:
"Hello Nicky 'Mike' Roth! It's time to take revenge. You broke into my house, now it’s time to me to break into yours! Don’t get angry kido! Time to taste your own medicine."

Nicky 'Mike' Roth is a very naughty kid. He needs to learn a lesson and not stalk his neighborhood.
Explore the neighbor’s house and reveal his secrets.
For too long has he been breaking into neighbors’ homes and now it’s time to see what he’s up to in his own home. Your curiosity has the got the better of you and it’s your turn to be stealthy and speak inside next-door.

Be careful not to get acquainted or for him to catch you – you will end up back in your bedroom.

Avoid traps and explore his house carefully. The layout is complicated and you might get lost.
Make as little noise as you can as Mike hears everything.
Break windows and climb in, unlocked doors and move items to annoy him even more!
The tables have turned.
